item.description:
We’ll gather at 7:00 PM at Gloria’s home in Windsor for our monthly dinner and business meeting. Since it’s bound to be a chilly night, she is planning a chili night! When you RSVP, let us know if you can bring a pot of chili, or corn bread, an appetizer, dessert or beverages.

Since this event is in a private home, you must RSVP for directions.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
